select CMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(CMP.SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SDATE, TO_CHAR(CMP.EDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EDATE , CMP.PROG_STAT , TO_CHAR(CMP.APP_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APP_DAY , CMP_NO ,ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CMP_NO DESC) AS RNUM , EI.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME from cmp CMP INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON CMP.ADDEMP_NO = EI.EMP_NO where prog_stat in(4,5)
AND CMP.CMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND EI.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND CMP.PROG_STAT LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE CMP_APP SET APP_EMP_NO = 1, APP_DAY = SYSDATE , APP_STAT = 5 WHERE APP_NO = #{appno}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CMP_NO AS CMP_NO, C.CMP_NAME AS CMP_NAME,A.APP_STAT AS APP_STAT FROM CMP C INNER JOIN CMP_APP A ON C.CMP_NO = A.CMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO ON EMP_INFO.EMP_NO = A.APP_EMP_NO WHERE A.APP_NO = #{appno}

SELECT S.SIM_NO, CMP.CMP_NO AS CMP_NO, S.CHANNEL_NO AS CHANNEL_NO, SEND_SIZE, RECEIVE_SIZE, RESPONSE_SIZE, ACTUAL_RESPONSE_SIZE , CMP_NAME , C.CHANNEL_NAME AS CHANNEL_NAME , EI.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME FROM SIM_RESULT S INNER JOIN CMP ON S.CMP_NO = CMP.CMP_NO INNER JOIN CHANNEL C ON C.CHANNEL_NO = S.CHANNEL_NO INNER JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON CMP.MGR_NO = EI.EMP_NO WHERE S.CMP_NO = #{appno}
